page.description: Reset the query as if it had just been created.
page.original:
SQL::Query::Reset() Syntax .Reset() Argument Description A SQL::Query object created with a DIM statement.
Description The .Reset() method resets the values in the SQL::Query object as if it had just been created. Examples dim qry as SQL::Query qry.parse("Select * from Customer") ? qry.SQLStatement = "SELECT * FROM Customer" qry.reset() ? qry.SQLStatement = "SELECT"
See Also SQL::Query Object Limitations
